website_summaries.verdict: Long-lasting color, protective formula, and gorgeous tones make this hair color a top choice among consumers who color their hair at home. Made by one of the top brands in hair care and beauty products.
pros: Offers a triple-protection formula that's made with collagen, ceramide, and pro-keratin that combine to make hair soft and resilient
Does a good job coloring most gray
In addition to a post-color conditioner, the kit also includes a pre-color treatment to condition hair before applying color
cons: Some users gripe about colors turning out too dark or too "ashy."
Fades faster on gray hair, which is a common concern of permanent hair color

customer_reviews.title: Love this product - 4G
customer_reviews.text: The 4G has gotten hard to find, so I am glad to find it on Amazon. I am 60 and have used it for years and regularly get compliments on the color as people think I have no grey and are surprised when I tell them my hair is dyed. I have very long hair and find that if I use shampoo with no sulfates, and only put the color on the roots as my hair grows out (skip the last step of putting the color through the rest of your hair), that the color stays true for literally years, and my hair stays healthy (it also helps that I do not use heat for styling).
customer_reviews.author: cgl

customer_reviews.title: It’s black not brown
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought and used two 4A(Dark ash brown)s for my bust length hair. My hair was light ash brown color and it turned to deeeeep black! There is no ash and brown lol. Even though I didn't expected this deep dark black color, I still love it! It looks pretty cool :) Satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Consistently Excellent Results
customer_reviews.text: My hair looks consistently beautiful because of this wonderful, inexpensive product. I only color the routes, never add color to the rest. The result is rich highlights of coppery chocolate dark brown. Covers even stubborn greys but you have to leave it on longer than the instructions say but not too long or it blackens up. Takes me 12 minutes to apply to all roots then I leave it on for 48 minutes. Perfect every time. Easy to use. Saves lots of time and money to do it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Lia Sargent

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS LIKE A CHEMICAL PLANT NAUSEATED AND WELTS OF HIVES
customer_reviews.text: DYE MY HAIR A FRIEND DOESN IT. COLOR IS REALLY A BIT RED. THE CHEMICALS ARE SO AWFUL NEVER BUY THIS. .. LOOKS GOOD AFTER THE WHOLE ROUTINE AND A LONG HOT SHOWER TO GET THAT SMELL OUT. AWFUL.
customer_reviews.author: @rosebud

customer_reviews.title: the effect is surprising
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time to use this product.When mixing, it does not smell good, but the effect is surprising!
customer_reviews.author: JESSIE

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if it was a bad batch or what
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it was a bad batch or what, but my hair came out WAYYYY darker than it should have.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy from this seller!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write reviews but this product came so damaged that I felt I needed to. The packaging looks like it’s been re-taped together it was wilted like it had gotten wet I could not find an expiration date on anything which was weird and the product itself was leaky looks like it’s been opened before and the actual paper from the instructions was like brittle and crumbling it was really gross no way did I put this on my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Economical and good quality
customer_reviews.text: The dye has a creamy consistency which was easy to work with. I got great color, including good stubborn gray coverage. It comes with a comb which attaches to the developer bottle. I used it unattached. It worked well to comb the dye through my fairly short hair. I used a coloring brush and plastic bowl that I received with a previous dye so did I did not attach the comb to the developer bottle. The cream rinse that is included in the box is enough to use several times. This product is very economical, and I think my hair color looks as good as it does when I have it colored in a salon.
customer_reviews.author: Tangerine Skies

customer_reviews.title: Conditioner included leaves itchness.
customer_reviews.text: L'Oreal Paris Excellence Creme Permanent Hair Color, 6A Light Ash Brown, 2 Count. Ive been using this item for as long as I can remember. It's a perfect shade of brown, not too dark or too light and it's easy to apply. Included, cream for protecting the ends, solutions and conditioner. The reason for 1 star is for the conditioner that leaves my hair itchy. I'm sure they've changed the conditioner bc prior to last 6 months, I didn't have that issue. The Loreal color conditioner purchased from the store does not leave itchness so I always discard the ones that comes in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Vouloumanos

customer_reviews.title: Color is incorrect - not dark brown, more like black!
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched to this brand for better and longer lasting color. Unfortunately, the colors are off. This #4 says Dark Brown, but it is VERY DARK - more of a black brown. Very disappointed! I bought three of them, and unfortunately, I am unable to return them.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQzzz

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - Something Is Really Wrong
customer_reviews.text: Either this is a knock-off product or L’Oreal Paris has totally sold out. I’ve been using the medium brown for years with no problem ever. The box says “new formula”and it left my hair so dark, it’s almost black with a purplish ring around my hairline. I don’t believe L’Oreal would make such a bad product so I’m guessing that it was either tampered with or it’s a knock-off. The box is different, the instructions are different and the product is the worst. At least it didn’t leave me bald so I’m grateful for the little things. I will never order hair coloring on line again!
customer_reviews.author: Nickie O

customer_reviews.title: This hair color was very dated
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy about two things with this color. (1) I dyed my hair then had to dye it again and it still dud not take. (2) Dye was so dated, the color was yellow and would not even squeeze out the bottle. This is the second time in a row this happened so will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Topaz

customer_reviews.title: Dried out my hair
customer_reviews.text: This is okay but it is a lot more drying than I had expected even with the pre-treatment.. And I didn't expect that from this brand... So I'm not happy about this. This is the first time I've ever used this brand as well and have it set for subscription but I will probably cancel it because of how much it's dried my hair out... I won't use this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rummel

customer_reviews.title: Old Product, Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been using this product for many years. This time when she used it her hair did not take much color, When we open another of the new packages we got it had a strange color, it also has curds like old milk. I tried to find a date of manufacture or any date what so ever, none to be found. Needles to say no more L'Oreal Paris Excellence Creme Hair Color from Amazon. We threw the 2 new bottle away in the trash and she will go to the store to purchase new. Ray C.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful odor and definitely not light brown, more black
customer_reviews.text: I ended up having to use color remover and also have washed my hair many times plus used conditioning mask to get rid of color and odor. Got most of color out but still smell it and it will make you feel ill. Not sure why so bad because I have used this product before with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Dirty products
customer_reviews.text: I have a subscription for this L'Oreal hair color but the past two shipments that I received, all the pieces (including the box) came very dirty! I am kind of hesitant to use them. Is there a way to return them?
customer_reviews.author: O. Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Color: Medium Brown. This hides your grey or white hair very well. Made to make it easy to do yourself. I have been using it to cover my white hair for the past 3 yrs. I use it every 5 weeks and it saves me a lot of money not having it done at a salon. Directions are very straight forward and the box has everything you need from gloves, bottle, coloring tube, cream protector for ends & conditioner. If you dye your whole headr it can sometimes be a little dark so I mix this color with Medium Golden Brown and it looks absolutely great. I really am a big fan of the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Covers the Grays
customer_reviews.text: I consistently buy the light brown. It covers up all my gray hair very well. Lasts as long as having hair color done professionally.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: no stubborn grays remained
customer_reviews.text: The color is as expected and the feature I found most valuable was the fact that when I finished there were no visible grays on my hairline. Also the color was consistent (even though my hair before application was not) from root to tip. I am not a professional colorist but I feel as if I got professional results because of the color consistency on my hair and the fact that the color deposited evenly. My only concern is that 6 weeks later the hairs that were gray have faded to a golden brown which normally only happens when I use demi-permanent color so I deducted one star.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Davies

customer_reviews.title: The best for grey coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I may buy a different brand if I want to try a wild color, but I always come back to the Excellence Creme for consistent, professional looking color. The grey coverage is the best and the colors are vibrant (for as vibrant as brown can be, but some brands do look dull). The creame is easy to mix and apply and I have never had stained skin from the dye. It's so easy that I can color my hair in an hour without any forethought. I also use this with my mom who is 75 and it does great with her drier, brittle hair. L'Oreal made a great, simple, foolproof hair coloring system.
customer_reviews.author: Samie May

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away. It is Black dye, not dark brown
customer_reviews.text: I went from rich medium brown to BLACK. Buyers be aware, stay away from this Dark Ash Brown. I could literally cry now, since it took me 2 years to get the black dye out of my hair before, now im stuck again with black hair. I will never buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Assila

customer_reviews.title: If you want Dark Ash, Dark Ash is what you'll get...
customer_reviews.text: and if you want to cover your gray, it'll definitely do that, as well. Not sure how long the color will last before it'll fade, but hopefully quickly! It's way, way too dark for my liking and I only left on for the recommended 30 minutes. I'll be trying the L'Oréal Paris Excellence Créme Permanent Hair Color, in Mocha Ash Brown next time around.
customer_reviews.author: Just saying....

customer_reviews.title: Not at all like the box or description
customer_reviews.text: Wow I have no idea what's going on but this hair dye made my hair LIGHTER. How the hell?? I left it on for the allotted time and followed all instructions carefully. I was dying over purple so chose this because it's darker than the purple. Others I know have used chocolate browns to color over purple and it turned into a beautiful deep wine-ish color. No idea how this result I got is even possible. Is there bleach in this? Bad bad bad experience and i even spent like 3 hours researching the best option for me. My hair looks like shitty mouse light-brown. No.
customer_reviews.author: Dot Munson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and covers gray beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: Covered my gray perfectly! I had an inch and 122 of gray because I was unable to go to hairdresser with the virus. I received so ma y compliments that I am convinced I will no longer spend $159.99 at hair salon anymore. My hair was left very soft and shiny too. Photo shown I obviously hadn’t styled my hair but color is great! Can judge lingevity because only in for one week so far.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Hot Roots. Way Darker Than Promised.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 6A light ash brown to neutralize red tones in my brown hair. Basically my roots (1/8 inch new growth) are a very light brown and the rest of my hair is a very very dark brown black. It looks terrible. Hopefully color oops can strip it out. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Public Profile Name

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product...the creme hair dye is the best... I just wish that the amazon driver had place the items on the porch instead of the steps...because the cardboard box was completely wet and the the hair dye boxes inside were completely wet too. It rain the entire day of delivery and just placing it one more step up under the porch covering would of been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this formula and the color. The only thing that I would watch out for is leaving it on for even 5 minutes longer b/c IT WILL GET DARK FAST
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very good dye for a box dye
customer_reviews.text: It’s box dye.... But as box dye goes, its a good one! It’s a cream so mess is a lot less. And my grays roots grow out before it has a chance to fade, so guess the color lasts too (my hair grows super fast, so my roots need to be done every four weeks) Bonus! Cheaper on here than Walmart. At least in my area
customer_reviews.author: Jeanene Roeck

customer_reviews.title: 4A Ash Brown Comes Out Blue-Black
customer_reviews.text: 4A Ash Brown turned my hair jet black, not brown at all. I don’t think it’s user error, since I carefully followed the directions. It took over a month to fade to the desired color. Not a deal breaker for me, especially since it eventually became the color I wanted. I got 4A ash brown to return my hair to its natural color, after having bleached the bottom half of my hair. Pros + Great coverage: turned both virgin and processed hair the same color. + Easy to use. + Long-lasting: took over a month to fade from jet black to dark ash brown. Cons - Color was not ash brown, it was deep blue-black.
customer_reviews.author: Stark Twain

customer_reviews.title: My mom love it
customer_reviews.text: [4.5 Stars] My mom don't normally read the instruction. She started putting everything together. Fail to realize the pretreatment was for her ends. Due to that, I've called the manufacture and they said the mix is now ineffective and will not work. We end up having to go to the store to buy another box and trash the one from Amazon. I think the pre-treatment should have a WARNING note not to mix in the application. Aside from that everything was easy to use and my mom's hair looks great.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Good for home use
customer_reviews.text: I use to use L'Oreal Excellence Cream before I started going to my hairdresser more frequently. I use half the product for one use because I only do my gray roots. Because of the pandemic, I am not going to my hairdresser, so I started buying it again. It covers nicely, it's fairly easy to use if you are used to self-coloring your hair. I am really pleased with the color. I don't like the smell of the stuff to protect hair ends, or the conditioner that you are supposed to use after, I use my own conditioner. So far, my hair has been coming out pretty well and looks especially good right after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Color, Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This color has become harder to find in the stores so I have to order it online for the past couple of years. It's a shame because I've had so many compliments on this color. Have always loved the creme formula because it stays where you put it. The built-in condition in the color plus the tube of conditioner leaves my hair feeling so soft and shiny. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: tgs1117

customer_reviews.title: My hair came out black
customer_reviews.text: Since L'Oreal changed the hair dyes, there is no more Light Brown color. Medium brown comes out way too dark, almost black. I will need to change brand. Too bad, they should bring the light brown shade back.
customer_reviews.author: JM Perry

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell & color faded quickly.
customer_reviews.text: In a nutshell, I won’t be buying this again. As other reviewers have mentioned, the chemical scent of this product is horrible... The strongest I’ve smelled of any hair dye, and I’ve tried quite a few. I remember I couldn’t sleep the night that I dyed it because the smell was still so strong. Scary. But as far as the color, I went with an ash brown. It looked pretty good for the first week or two but the color quickly faded. There was also brassiness after that even though I was careful to keep it covered in the sun. ( I was told the “ash” tones were supposed to help with brassiness.)
customer_reviews.author: OnTheRox

customer_reviews.title: Great Gray Coverage, but too dark, almost black, consider lighter shade.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to color my roots, great gray coverage and easy to apply at home. What i disliked: 1- It suppose to be dark brown, but it turn out black, i will buy lighter shade next time. 2- It is good for 2 or 3 times root touch up, but the fact that developer is inside the container makes it difficult to use it multiple times, i had to mix the color and developer in another bowl because i was not planning to use the whole tube.
customer_reviews.author: Eye

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage , Great Color-Tried and True
customer_reviews.text: Provides good coverage of grey hair..and this particular color- Medium Golden Brown- I find complimentary and near my original hair color.This I am pleased with...No more searching. I am a repeat buyer of this product. Quick and not so messy at all. I find the optional comb applicator included very much a plus. I have found no adverse reactions nor very strong odor in using the product...another important factor in using it.. I recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: I have started to get a few gray hairs here and there that were annoying me whenever I looked closely in the mirror
customer_reviews.text: My natural hair color is as shown on the box. I have started to get a few gray hairs here and there that were annoying me whenever I looked closely in the mirror, so I decided to try and color my hair. Unfortunately after coloring my hair is both darker and now has a reddish/orangeish tint to it. Nothing particularly artificial-looking, but certainly not what I was going for with an ash color. It did cover the grays, though. Maybe the darkness will fade a bit but I imagine I'm stuck with the orange. Would have preferred to stick with my grays!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Dark Ash Brown is black
customer_reviews.text: I had light brown hair but was wanting to go back to my natural dark brown hair. I purchased the Dark Ash Brown color thinking that would be very close to my natural color. I am very experienced with coloring my hair and I followed the instructions very well. I was so disappointed after washing out the color. It dyed my hair almost jet black. Not brown at all. I see a lot of the reviews on here saying they had the same problem. So don’t purchase the dark ash brown unless you want black hair.
customer_reviews.author: Matt KY

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair color
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair color! Can send you a little darker than you imagine if you are already a light brunette to begin with. Everyone seemed to love it though!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Walker

customer_reviews.title: Shipped in bubble bag- totally crushed
customer_reviews.text: Product was usable but the packaging by Amazon was the worst. Should have been boxed, came crushed. Amazed it was usable. Price is great and so is the product. Color keeps the brass out which I have trouble with. Comes with the extra tube to fight color build up on the ends. Use the conditioner once a week or more to help retain color. Use non-sulfate shampoo for best results after first 24 hours is up. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: TornadoRoo

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware...
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied Witt this product, I have used this brand in particular a few times when I couldn’t go to my hairdresser. Ash Brown turned by hair black, it changed the texture of my hair as well.,, Check to see if this is a counterfeit before purchasing..,
customer_reviews.author: RITA SINGH

customer_reviews.title: Good color
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This is my go to. Covers well, lasts, great value.
customer_reviews.author: Professional Mother

customer_reviews.title: Excellence Wins!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best color on my hair than that I have use, it looks like a natural brown with highlights. It does not fade or change color. Includes pre coloring conditioner, and fab creme conditioner for weekly use between, 8 weeks before next coloring!
customer_reviews.author: LaVerne13

customer_reviews.title: Been using for years.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried different brands and always go back to this. The color lasts longer than others and the color looks rich. I get compliments on my hair color, which is awesome since I don’t pay to get it done. I can never find it in the stores though, so I’m guessing this shade is popular, since its out of stock a lot where I shop. I’m good with ordering it from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Coletto

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a change while in quarantine, so I decided to color over my blond ombre on my dark brown hair. I have very thick long dark hair and order two boxes. It was allot darker the first few days (closer to black) but faded to a dark brown that is my natural hair color. My blond has not shown through and I dyed my hair over a month ago. I suggest having someone else help if you have allot of hair. Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work on dark hair
customer_reviews.text: This product smells super strong and harmful, and really made cannot keep eyes open. I have dark hair and the result doesn’t turn very well, only a little color but obvious not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gray coverage
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand for years. I like the thick consistency. It wraps around each strand of hair and gives it a rich color. It has good gray coverage (70% gray hair) when I use light brown or darker. My hair is thick, so I use two boxes so I get the best color and coverage.
customer_reviews.author: SusanS

customer_reviews.title: Too dark on my hair
customer_reviews.text: I liked the package and everything included in it. I liked to give it 5 star but the color was way different than the picture. It was extremely dark, almost black. After several days it gets lighter but still not even close to what is shown in the picture. I understand that every hair is different so I will give 4 star because I think the quality was good.
customer_reviews.author: Ela

customer_reviews.title: Covered gray well but color is nothing like the image on the box
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the color is good and the kit they provide is very good, but don't trust the images they show you. I generally have a lighter shade of brown and assumed going with a medium browner would be correct. Not correct. I thought I'd be somewhat close to the model on the box as that's pretty much what I had already - just with gray roots. it turned out a very dark brown. Looks almost black against my pale skin. So if you're particular you'd better test on your hair sample as they suggest or you might get a surprise at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Daddy

customer_reviews.title: worked pretty well...
customer_reviews.text: This worked pretty well, but I only kept it on for about 20 minutes, since it was obvious my hair was turning darker than I wanted. I did purchase a lighter shade, I'd recommend getting 2 shades lighter. Grey coverage was okay, at least the roots won't be so noticeable until I can get to the salon when it reopens.
customer_reviews.author: purrl

customer_reviews.title: Product Quality and Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I have received a defective already used hair color. The content leaked in the entire packaging. There is no way to contact customer service for a return item or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Zerin

customer_reviews.title: Delivered with a BROKEN Bottle.
customer_reviews.text: The glass bottle was delivered broken with dye leaking. I understand some products are bit returnable, but delivered broken and leaking should be an exception. Also the deliverer said it was delivered to a person. That cannot be true. My wife and I are abiding the quarantine and ONLY one of us (me) handle deliveries 1x a day.
customer_reviews.author: NewCo Builder

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: It was the WORST hair color, that my wife has ever used. She had not such a horrible experience, before. It had a lot of bad effect on the SKIN. When my wife applied it, her skin burnt, made some red spot on her forehead and after that she lost a lot of her hair . it had very bad odor. The design of tubes (Tube #2) inside the box was differ from design of other tubes and differ from the pictures on the Box. We never buy it again. never never never
customer_reviews.author: Hamid

customer_reviews.title: Have had many compliments on this color
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been coloring my hair with this color for at least 10 years. I’ve had many people compliment me on the color. Of course I’ve had to admit that it’s not my natural hair color. I’ve always been able to buy this color at the store until recently. I have to buy on Amazon now because I cannot find it in any of my stores anymore. I hope they don’t stop making it. I hate change.
customer_reviews.author: Queenbee

customer_reviews.title: This item arrived open and leaked into the Amazon box on to my other items.
customer_reviews.text: Because of the above, I could not salvage the L'Oreal product. I want a replacement at no charge. I cannot return the open box because it is a mess. You will have to take my word for it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kay Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A surprisingly great experience
customer_reviews.text: I have used hair color much more expensive for years, but when I decided to try a richer brown, this product exceeded my expectations. My hair did not dry out, the color lasted well beyond my other hair color products and the color is simply perfect. I don’t plan to switch again- found my color and brand!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for a while now. I decided to get it was from Amazon, due to the price. The last two months I have used this product it was horrible. It was just thrown in a box. I did what I usually do to color my hair. My hair came out red red and throughout my hair was different colors. I'll pay the extra money to make sure it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Nice color.
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can order this now instead of having to go to a store and purchase it. Love the product and color.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through so many colors I'm not sure what my "natural" color is anymore. The last color I did last year around this time was a rich all over red that's lasted an entire year, I used a product to take it out about 2 weeks ago but it made my hair look strange in some areas. Anywho, I bought this to apply and try to look normal for once, I must say this is by far one of the more beautiful colors I've applied to my hair, very dark but definitely still brown, not going to lie I'll probably keep this color from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Darrian

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Really like this hair color product even better than what my hairdresser uses. It leaves my hair soft and shiny. Plus I save lots of money doing it myself. Now I can go get my nails done with the money I save. : )
customer_reviews.author: J. McGee

customer_reviews.title: Love the conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Tried 6a light ash brown which I used over brassy lightish brown/ dark blonde previously colored hair. Still has some brassy orange tones but looks okay. I did not want to dark of a shade which would of just served to accentuate an almost 60 year old face. Covered 50 percent gray well. Love the conditioner!
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect name for this product
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of grey hairs and my natural hair is dark brown. I tried many brand for grey hair. This is the best
customer_reviews.author: Ncmom

customer_reviews.title: didn't cover roots
customer_reviews.text: I followed directions - even setting a timer to be sure I left dye on as long as instructions stated. It didn't cover the gray at all! Step 3 - tube that you use at the end, had a definite bad smell. I thought it was harsh. Choose another product.
customer_reviews.author: Wordsmith

customer_reviews.title: Color is OFF
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard with hair dye to know how your hair will turn out depending on your hair type. However, my hair color was a very light red (previously dyed and I tried to let the red color fade for months). I got the LIGHT brown hair dye. MY HAIR IS ALMOST BLACK. It’s smooth. Doesn’t seem like harsh hair dye. But I’m frustrated. I got this color to even out my hair since my natural looks exactly what is pictured on this box. But it turned out so dark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I needed an easy to use all-over color to get me through COVID-19. This fit the bill for sure! It was easy to use, covered my grays, and the color looks great! Its a true dark, chocolatey brown color, and easily colors other color you might have on your hair. If needed, I will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Englert

customer_reviews.title: Smell very chemical
customer_reviews.text: It has four parts, actually I didn’t get to know the fiction of every item. It is in good deal , but very chemical. It is my first time use this, I think I won’t purchase again.For my daughter cover the nose and run away...It smells so chemical.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Covers well
customer_reviews.text: I never use box color but with COVID on the rise I am not going to get my hair done. So I tried this. I was pleasantly surprised, it really did cover well. I think the only downside is it does wash out after 2 weeks although permanent .
customer_reviews.author: T. Tepedino

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Sooo, I shouldn't have gone so dark, but it definitely worked. It was easy to use and has nice applicators. It also comes with a creme to add to split ends before you apply the color. I should've known dark brown was going to be a bit too dark for me, but it definitely worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Carisa W

customer_reviews.title: Hair color at home
customer_reviews.text: I have never colored at home, but since I have been on lock down, I needed to cover my gray. My husband did the work and it turned out beautifully. My hair was shiny and so soft. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dillow

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how or why this turned out auburn but it’s definitely orangey-tan. Never had hair color go red on me before. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Will not use
customer_reviews.text: When I received this order. The box was open crushed the cream rants was leaking out of the top of the. Cap. I don’t feel comfortable using this on my head after seeing that it has been opened not knowing if someone has put something in it.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Davis Claunch

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy and budget friendly
customer_reviews.text: My first DIY boxed hair color experience and it was so easy! Went with Dark Brown #4 (about 1 shade darker than my natural brown) and I like it. Turned out as dark as brown can be without being black and has a warm tone in sunlight. Even color throughout and covered all my old, brassy balayage highlights nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Best color cream to cover grey hair
customer_reviews.text: I have been coloring my roots every other week for years now with this product, and the result is great! It us super easy to use, it does not damage the hair, it covers the greys perfectly, and the color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: MLL

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy and affordable it is to do it myself. My hair grows fast so yes I would have to color my hair every two months, not to bad. At least I don’t have to pay $$$ to get it done in a salon.. it covers my grey really well, love this color. This is my go to product.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Very dark!  Longevity a positive if you like the color
customer_reviews.text: My hair is lighter and it turned out black. It is very dark. I look awful. BUT, I immediately washed my hair with lemon juice (1/2 a lemon), a tsp of bleach, dish soap, and laundry soap mixed together and IT DID NOT FADE AT ALL. I am still waiting to see when it fades if it fades to grey. It is BLACK.
customer_reviews.author: L.L.

customer_reviews.title: I won't use anything else from now on!!
customer_reviews.text: The comb included really, really helps application. It makes it so much easier! The color is very pretty and natural looking. I will use this brand from now on. Oh, and it covers super stubborn grays!!😁
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Bad vendor product.
customer_reviews.text: This vendor sent a bad product. Items were sticky in box & I assumed hurt in transport, but the results were that of old, bad color. My light brown was almost black. I've been coloring long enough to know this effect.
customer_reviews.author: COURTNEY SEABOLT

customer_reviews.title: Color fade issues
customer_reviews.text: Love the color but faded within days and after blow drying/styling . Unsure as to why... I was a dirty blonde and went to a brown. Maybe it is my hair or product?. I have used this 3x in 2 months time to try to keep the color from fading.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Haircolor
customer_reviews.text: I've tried pretty much every box hair color available and always go back to this one. It's very easy to apply, it doesn't drip so it doesn't get all over my arms and shoulders either. The color always looks so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to use and came out exactly how I wanted it. I used it because of the social distancing normally going to a salon and I am going to keep dying at home. Saves ALOT of money and came great for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good color and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My own color faded to light brown and I have lots of white hair at the sides. I bought this dark brown to cover my white hair. And it came out perfect. I paid less than $10 to have the $100 salon effect. The smell is ok, just like the ones at salon. Overall, it’s a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: chikah

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The final color on my hair matches the color on the box. I love the non drip formula and the comb applicator. It makes it easy to apply to the mid shaft and ends of my hair. Overall I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived undamaged
customer_reviews.text: Good product. First time purchasing this kind of product online. Just figured out it was easier than drive to the store and also wanted to avoid all non staying home people. Worthy it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great hair color. Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Great color and the conditioner is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie  Hott

customer_reviews.title: Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite hair color and I'm glad I can get it on Amazon. It's thick so it doesn't drip all over the place while it's working. It's the best one I've found to cover the gray!
customer_reviews.author: BeYouTful

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color and it seems to last longer than most brands. The color doesn’t fade real easy and it’s well worth every penny. I used to go to the salon and pay anywhere from$60-100 for the results I get now from this box dye. It’s easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tnharvey

customer_reviews.title: It IS very dark
customer_reviews.text: I wanted really DARK, almost black and this color is perfect! It looked black the first day or so but has faded ever so slightly to the really dark brunette I love. Couldn't beat the price too, it was the least expensive color option and I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeana

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To
customer_reviews.text: Have used this brand for years...very pleased with all aspects of product and use. Had a problem with other brands not depositing enough color...not with this one. Also not as harsh on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: R M Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I dont know whether color will last as long as before.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as superior hair color. Not sure why. Extra steps inpretreating, I did not understand why, but color is ok.
customer_reviews.author: marie r. gaines

customer_reviews.title: Loved the Color!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this hair color, medium golden brown. It allowed me to only dye my roots. It did not dry out my hair or anything. I really liked this brand and you won't go wrong if you purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: The cardboard container was completely torn
customer_reviews.text: I have no doubt about the product but the container was completely torn.
customer_reviews.author: Arpita Shrivastava

customer_reviews.title: Great home color kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is my normal hair color kit. I was glad to be able to purchase this online, as there was a shortage of hair color at my local grocery stores during the Covid19 pandemic. Covers grey really well and matches my natural color!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never color my hair before, I didn’t know how easy to touch up the root and hair color! It works magically!! Gray hair disappears like that! I saved $$$ I’m gonna get more.
customer_reviews.author: Tu

customer_reviews.title: not upto standard
customer_reviews.text: I am a loreal fan but this experience was bad. Dried my hair and didnt even give full grey coverage.. something is wrong with the shade and the whole product .
customer_reviews.author: Sabz

customer_reviews.title: Kate Beckett says HI
customer_reviews.text: Hair color is good, lasts till the next haircut. Beckett on the box. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Amazorro

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as CVS
customer_reviews.text: I have used this exact product for years and always purchased it at CVS. Exact same packaging as what I've bought in the past but once mixed, it was very thin and dripped off my head. This is a creme coloring and should be "drip-proof". Something not right with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda C. Spivack

customer_reviews.title: No change in color
customer_reviews.text: This die did not change my hair color at all! I haven’t died my hair in 4 months so there should be no reason that my hair couldn’t take on the color. Never had this happen to me before
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Elser

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product it really covers any gray hair and the color Is beautiful. I have dark brown hair and it gives a natural looking glow to my hair without turning It orange. Definitely will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Bella Reed

customer_reviews.title: Looked great but faded fast
customer_reviews.text: I have to say when I first used this product the color was beautiful shiny and looked natural and I loved it. I was very disappointed when it started to fade quickly. In six weeks it’s like my hair is completely back to the same color. I ordered the dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well, didnt last long tho
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this color would stay long, but it didn't... It's easy to use but smells terrible and the color is now fading quickly. Not sure I'd recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: pengfei1993

product_meta.title: L'Oreal Paris Excellence Creme Permanent Hair Color, 4 Dark Brown, 100% Gray Coverage Hair Dye, Pack of 1
product_meta.description:
Color:4 Dark Brown| Size:Pack of 1There's a reason it's called Excellence. Nothing protects or covers grays better*. L’Oreal Excellence Crème’s Exclusive Triple Protection System seals, replenishes and conditions your hair for up to 8 weeks of protection. All that, and 100% gray hair coverage, even on stubborn grays.*compared to each leading competitor's top selling brand.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Having trouble finding the right shade? Questions on how to apply your L'Oreal Paris Hair Color product? Ask a L'Oreal Hair Color Expert.


If you have a question about a L'Oreal Paris Hair Color product, talk to one of our L’Oreal Customer Care representatives.


Phone: 1-888-768-2914

Monday-Friday, 9:00 AM-5:30PM ET
feature_bullets: RADIANT HAIR COLOR WITH TRIPLE PROTECTION: No hair color cares more than Excellence Crème. With our triple protection system that seals, replenishes, and conditions, plus 100% gray coverage even on stubborn grays, it's called Excellence for a reason.

EXCELLENCE IN HAIR PROTECTION: Our weekly conditioning treatment with collagen helps protect hair until your next hair coloring, for long lasting radiance. For 100% gray coverage & gorgeous root-to-tip color, treat yourself to Excellence Creme hair color.

L'OREAL PERMANENT HAIR COLOR: L'Oreal Paris Hair Color comes in multiple formulations and styles to deliver long-lasting color, from fade-defying Superior Preference, to bold, stylish Feria, and gray-coverage from Excellence Crème.

LONG LASTING HAIR COLOR: Get beautiful color from root-to-tip with L'Oréal Paris hair color, permanent, semi-permanent, and root touch up kits. Cover gray hair, highlight, go bold with bright color, or even try an ombre hair color.

L'OREAL PARIS INNOVATION: We are a total beauty care company that combines the latest in technology with the highest in quality for the ultimate in hair color, hair care, hair style, skin care & cosmetics.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
